|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |

|  [createAction(opts, req, res)](./node-git-server.createaction.md) | responds with the correct service depending on the action |
|  [infoResponse(git, repo, service, req, res)](./node-git-server.inforesponse.md) | sends http response using the appropriate output from service call |
|  [noCache(res)](./node-git-server.nocache.md) | adds headers to the response object to add cache control |
